pages.text: $(FF0000)$(bold)Void Touch$()$() $(important)destroys blocks$() instead of dropping them!$(br2)$(FF0000)WARNING:$() This effect $(important)deletes blocks permanently$(). Use with extreme caution!

pages.title: Primary Material
pages.text: $(FF0000)Barrier$() grants Void Touch +1$(br2)Requires creative mode or commands to obtain!

pages.title: Use Cases
pages.text: $(li)Clearing large areas fast$(li)Removing unwanted blocks$(li)Terraforming projects$(li)World editing$(li)Creative mode building$(br2)$(important)Not for mining ores!$() You'll lose everything!

pages.title: Safety Tips
pages.text: $(FF0000)DANGER ZONE$()$(br2)$(li)No drops = no items$(li)Cannot recover voided blocks$(li)Use dedicated void tools$(li)Keep separate from mining tools$(li)Label clearly!$(br2)$(o)With great power comes great regret!$()
